description: Stretchdown™ Light takes all the moves-with-you stretch, durability, and insulating warmth of our tried-and-true Stretchdown™ Collection and makes it light enough to pack in its own pocket. The warmth and packability of high-quality down insulation, the durability of a woven to resist snags and tears, and the comfortable stretch of a sweatshirt–all in a lightweight, do-everything hoody. From trailhead to the brewery back in town, over bases or under a waterproof shell, this pullover layer is made to go places.
name: Mountain Hardwear StretchDown Light Pullover Hoody - Mens
